Text: Yo, Fellow Pirates, Monsieur Spock is back and kicking some serious ass once again! Thank you, Leonard, for fleshing out comic book collections with a logical style all your own!

Ah shit! Careful with the hyperbole now RayFord. lol Though I do appreciate the sentiment of the compliment, as I try very hard to represent certain types of books and creators that I think are lacking here at TPB.
